text: I love the fact that the gluten-free products by larabar say so right on the display box in the store so it takes the guess work out of it for you. They taste just like the flavor they're supposed to and aren't too sweet for a quick snack. They still hold you over until you can get some actual food in your stomach, which is great. I keep these around as much as I can! My favorite GF flavors are key lime pie, pecan pie, apple pie, and banana nut bread.
